Text.Language: Vai e~tafenf e~p~swi n~ouyucia ecs/p: hijen pic~tauroc: qa p~oujai m~pengenoc.
This is He who offered Himself up, as an acceptable sacrifice, on the Cross for the salvation of our race.
هذا الذي أصعد ذاته ذبيحة مقبولة علي الصليب عن خلاص جنسنا.
Afswlem e~rof n~je pefiwt n~a~gayoc: m~v~nau n~te hana~rouhi: hijen ]Golgoya.
His good Father smelled Him at the evening watch on Golgotha.
فاشتمه أبوه الصالح وقت المساء علي الجلجثة.
